content.raw:
One of the goals of this design is to be able to switch physics engines while Gazebo is currently running, which doesn't currently appear to be a feature. There are a few options for implementing this:

1. Create a function in World that constructs, loads and inits a new PhysicsEngine and deletes the old one.
2. Preload a PhysicsEngine object for each physics element in SDF, and create a function in World to switch between the physics engines.

I originally underestimated the amount of infrastructure needed to implement this feature, so I'll hold off on it for a while.
